HylexCrypt - The Ultimate 2050
An advanced open-source steganography and cryptography tool.

Export Control Notice:
This software includes encryption and may be subject to the laws and regulations
of your jurisdiction regarding the import, use, and export of cryptographic
software. See `EXPORT_COMPLIANCE.md` for details.

FIPS Compliance Notice:
This project is NOT FIPS 140-3 validated. While it may use FIPS-approved
algorithms, it cannot be claimed as FIPS-certified. See `FIPS_EXPORT.md` for details.
